briefdescription.para: Create a new ssh agent structure.

simplesect.para: An allocated ssh agent structure or NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Free an allocated ssh agent structure.

parameterdescription.para: The ssh agent structure to free.

briefdescription.para: Check if the ssh agent is running.

parameterdescription.para: The ssh session to check for the agent.

simplesect.para: 1 if it is running, 0 if not.

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, const ssh_key pubkey, struct ssh_buffer_struct *data)
memberdef.name: ssh_agent_sign_data
